fda_announcement: The FDA is aware of an emerging shortage due to a disruption in one manufacturer's supply. We are monitoring the situation closely. Manufacturers and supply chain partners are encouraged to provide updates and projections to facilitate resolution.
The FDA is closely monitoring the current emerging shortage situation. We encourage manufacturers to report any production issues and for stakeholders to stay informed on future updates.

The FDA is closely monitoring the emerging drug shortage and encourages manufacturers and stakeholders to report any supply disruptions. We are coordinating efforts to ensure minimal impact on patient care.
